mapper.update: update sys_project set status_code =2 where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT project.project_id, project.company_id, project.`year`, project.`month`, project.project_finished_total,project.previous_file_mes,project.accept_file_mes, project.project_unfinished_total, project.create_time, project.status_code, energy.month_consumption_electricity, energy.month_consumption_water,company.company_name FROM sys_project AS project LEFT JOIN sys_energy AS energy ON project.project_id = energy.project_id LEFT JOIN sys_company AS company ON company.company_id = project.company_id where 1=1 and project.status_code!=2 and project.project_id=#{projectId}

SELECT file_id as fileId,file_name as fileName,file_size as fileSize,file_url as fileUrl,project_id as projectId,upload_time as uploadTime,file_type as fileType FROM sys_project_energy_file where 1=1 and project_id=#{projectId}
SELECT project_id as projectId FROM sys_project where 1=1 and company_id=#{companyId} and year=#{year} and month=#{month} and status_code!=2

SELECT SUM(project.project_unfinished_total) AS project_unfinished_total, SUM(project.project_finished_total) AS project_finished_total, SUM(month_consumption_electricity) as month_consumption_electricity, SUM(month_consumption_water) as month_consumption_water FROM sys_project AS project LEFT JOIN sys_energy AS energy ON project.project_id = energy.project_id WHERE 1=1
AND project.company_id IN
#{item}
AND project.company_id IN(SELECT company_id from sys_company where status_code!=2)
and project.year=#{year} and project.month=#{month} and project.status_code!=2

SELECT SUM(energy.month_consumption_electricity) as month_consumption_electricity, SUM(energy.month_consumption_water) as month_consumption_water, project.month FROM sys_project AS project LEFT JOIN sys_energy AS energy ON project.project_id = energy.project_id WHERE 1=1 /*注：type为1时，为按区域查询（小区）查询数据，type为2时，不考虑登录用户权限内小区，查询全国数据，即是物业大屏数据展示分析接口使用*/
